basics.label: Construction Manager
basics.summary: Energetic Construction Manager consistently involved in all facets of the projects. Extremely knowledgeable in Pipe lines, gas and oil facility's and Mining industry regulations and construction, providing expert direction in all aspects of contract construction. Able to recognize problems and solve them and a full understanding the important of forming a strong relationship with the owners and engineers for the good of the project and future work.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed the construction of the API tanks and facility along with the pipe line from the port to the facility.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Construction manager for shut down installation, tank projects, structural, civil work, building pump stations and revitalizing a retired mine site.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed the set up and all logistics for a variety of projects, including tank installations, pipe line constructions, setting up pump stations, etc.

skills.name: Construction Management
keywords: Specifications API 6A; 5L; 15D; 1104; 653 ASTM A36; A350; A694;392; AWS D1.!
